SELECT DISTINCT t.WR_DOC_NUM wrDocNum, t.id id, t.depa_name depaName, s.supplier_code supplierCode, s.supplier_name supplierName, A.dt_name twtName, t.WR_DATE wrDate, CONCAT(IFNULL(A.dt_name,''),'-',IFNULL(B.TYPE_NAME,'')) as twtTypeName, r.user_name userName, t.WR_INPUT_DATE wrInputDate, t.RETURN_ERP_FLAG returnErpFlag, t.WH_CODE whCode, t.WR_STATE wrState, t.PROJECT_ID projectId, t.customer customer, ar.AR_NAME whName -- 仓库名称 FROM sms_wms_receive_doc t LEFT JOIN ums_supplier s on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=s.supplier_code LEFT JOIN ums_user r on t.wr_input_no=r.user_account LEFT JOIN sms_wms_receive_detail d on t.WR_DOC_NUM=d.WR_DOC_NUM LEFT JOIN sms_wms_io_type A on t.DT_CODE=A.dt_code LEFT JOIN sms_wms_erp_doc_type B ON t.TWT_DID=B.d_id LEFT JOIN ums_wms_area ar ON t.wh_code=ar.AR_SN WHERE 1=1
and t.depa_code in
#{item}
and s.supplier_name LIKE '%${p.supplierName}%'
and r.user_name LIKE '%${p.userName}%'
and t.WR_STATE LIKE '%${p.wrState}%'
and t.WH_CODE LIKE '%${p.whCode}%'
and t.WR_INPUT_NO LIKE '%${p.wrInputNo}%'
and CONCAT(IFNULL(A.dt_name,''),'-',IFNULL(B.TYPE_NAME,'')) LIKE '%${p.twtTypeName}%'
and t.dt_code = #{p.dtCode}
and t.twt_did = #{p.twtDid}
and t.WR_DOC_NUM LIKE '%${p.wrDocNum}%'
and d.ERP_PO LIKE '%${p.erpPo}%'
and t.WR_INPUT_DATE >= '${p.startTime}'
and '${p.endTime}' >= t.WR_INPUT_DATE
order by t.WR_STATE asc,t.id desc

SELECT DISTINCT t.WR_DOC_NUM wrDocNum, t.id id, t.SUPPLIER_CODE supplierCode, t.customer customer, s.supplier_name supplierName, t.WR_DATE wrDate, r.user_name userName, t.WR_INPUT_DATE wrInputDate, t.WR_STATE wrState FROM sms_wms_receive_doc t LEFT JOIN ums_supplier s on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=s.supplier_code LEFT JOIN ums_user r on t.wr_input_no=r.user_account LEFT JOIN sms_wms_receive_detail d on t.WR_DOC_NUM=d.WR_DOC_NUM WHERE 1=1
and t.dt_code = #{p.dtCode}
and t.WR_DOC_NUM LIKE '%${p.wrDocNum}%'
and s.supplier_name LIKE '%${p.supplierName}%'
and t.WR_INPUT_DATE >= '${p.startTime}'
and '${p.endTime}' >= t.WR_INPUT_DATE
and d.CO_ITEM_CODE LIKE '%${p.coItemCode}%'
order by t.WR_STATE asc,t.id desc
SELECT MAX(s.WR_DOC_NUM) FROM sms_wms_receive_doc s WHERE s.WR_DOC_NUM like '${yyyyMM}%'

SELECT DISTINCT d.id id, d.depa_name depaName, d.WR_DOC_NUM wrDocNum, d.ERP_PO erpPo, d.PLAN_NUM planNum, d.RECEIVE_NUM receiveNum, d.CO_ITEM_CODE coItemCode, i.CO_ITEM_NAME coItemName, d.ERP_PO_ITEM_NO erpPoItemNo, t.WR_DATE wrDate, t.WR_STATE wrState, A.dt_name twtName, CONCAT(IFNULL(A.dt_name,''),'-',IFNULL(B.TYPE_NAME,'')) as twtTypeName, s.supplier_name supplierName, r.user_name userName, t.WR_INPUT_DATE wrInputDate, d.REMARK remark FROM (select * from sms_wms_receive_detail
and depa_code in
#{item}
and WR_DOC_NUM LIKE '%${p.wrDocNum}%'
and WH_CODE LIKE '%${p.whCode}%'
and CO_ITEM_CODE LIKE '%${p.coItemCode}%'
and ERP_PO_ITEM_NO LIKE '%${p.erpPoItemNo}%'
and ERP_PO LIKE '%${p.erpPo}%'
) d LEFT JOIN sms_wms_receive_doc t on t.WR_DOC_NUM=d.WR_DOC_NUM LEFT JOIN ums_item_sap i on d.CO_ITEM_CODE=i.CO_ITEM_CODE LEFT JOIN ums_supplier s on t.SUPPLIER_CODE=s.supplier_code LEFT JOIN ums_user r on t.wr_input_no=r.user_account LEFT JOIN sms_wms_io_type A on t.DT_CODE=A.dt_code LEFT JOIN sms_wms_erp_doc_type B ON t.twt_did=B.d_id WHERE 1=1
and s.supplier_name LIKE '%${p.supplierName}%'
and t.WR_STATE LIKE '%${p.wrState}%'
and t.dt_code = #{p.dtCode}
and t.twt_did = #{p.twtDid}
and i.CO_ITEM_NAME LIKE '%${p.itemName}%'
and CONCAT(IFNULL(A.dt_name,''),'-',IFNULL(B.TYPE_NAME,'')) LIKE '%${p.twtTypeName}%'
and t.WR_INPUT_DATE >= '${p.startTime}'
and '${p.endTime}' >= t.WR_INPUT_DATE
order by t.WR_STATE asc,t.id desc
